meanings.definition: A device for measuring the pressure of a gas.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used monometers to check the gas pressure in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The monometers in the factory help ensure the safety of the workers.
meanings.sent3: The monometers at the gas station decided to go on strike for better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: Her precision was like that of a monometer, always accurately measuring the gas pressure.
meanings.sent5: The monometers hummed softly as they recorded the gas pressure changes.
